item.description:
World Tai Chi Day
@ Colchester Town Green

This event is part of the global World Tai Chi Healing Wave that starts in New Zealand and migrates around the world with celebrations beginning at 10:00 AM in every time zone. Last year’s World Tai Chi Day saw celebrations in 70 countries on 6 continents and in hundreds of cities in the US and around the world.

We’ll start with a mass Qigong (Chinese energy healing technique) exercise led by Dr Ming Wu of the Wu Healing Center in West Hartford. We invite Connecticut and local residents to join us for a day of FREE workshops and demonstrations presented by more than 17 local tai chi and qigong teachers and masters.

A schedule of 24 workshops, multiple demonstrations and the mass qigong exercise will offer something for everyone, from the merely curious to the experienced practitioner.

Come join us for what we expect to be a day full of fun, education and celebration of these two wonderful ancient Chinese martial and healing arts. Details including directions and schedule for the day can be found by visiting: http://www.connecticuttaichi.us/

 

For more information:

Contact George Hoffman,

Director, Silver Dragon Tai Chi & Qi Gong

860-742-5892 – www.silverdragontaichi.com
item.name: World Tai Chi & Qi Gong Day
